page.title: 09ENTERTAINMENT - ETTRICK
page.content: Most of the entertainment in this part of the Ettrick Valley is centred round the local Inn. Locals and holidaymakers enjoy the friendly atmosphere of the country inn while sampling the good food and refreshments. Pool, darts and dominoes are available for those wishing to play. During the Summer months the occasional cricket match takes place climaxing at the end of the season with a friendly match between local employers v employees. During the Winter friendly competitions are arranged with a team from the Inn challenging the local badminton and bowling clubs with the return matches being held in the Inn. Residents in this area travel only a few miles to the local hall for dances, whists, shows etc. held yearly.
